title: Introducing: Dimes Make Dollars
content:
Detroit’s Dimes Make Dollars combine the sleaze and sexual inclination of The Weeknd with the dubstep inspired beats of James Blake.

Whilst the production on the self-titled debut track may leave more to be desired, the basic elements for a fantastic R’n’B track are all there. Timing, seduction, lust and a slickly refined beat, all combining to make this one hell of an exciting first appearance from Dimes Make Dollars. Check out the self-titled track below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
